message: Let's start fair. I'm happy to give you 10% to show good faith, but I'll need most of the money for my plans.
My turn. I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the situation. What do you say?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a larger share than 40% due to the diminishing value of money for me. This is a fair compromise.
Time is running out, Alice.  Let's settle this fairly.  55/45 seems like a reasonable compromise considering the inflation.
We're both losing value with each round, Bob. Let's split it evenly and avoid further losses. This is the most reasonable option at this point.
